subject: Shipping and receiving
description_text:
I recently placed an order on dec 8th for the new pro h shifter and I
haven't  received an email or shipping information I paid extra to get it
here fast its been a whole month I haven't received  my product

conversations.body_text:
Thank you for your response

On Fri, Jan 2, 2026, 9:27 AM service@simsonn.com
I received the hs pro shifter today but none of the input are working

Good b evening I placed an order on dec 8th 2025 I received the packaged on
Jan 5 2026 and unit is not working I would like to request a refund
Thank you

On Fri, Jan 2, 2026, 9:21 AM david manning <r3ac1nt0th3star@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I recently placed an order on dec 8th for the new pro h shifter and I
> haven't  received an email or shipping information I paid extra to get it
> here fast its been a whole month I haven't received  my product
>

Hi david manning,  Please provide a video. Also, confirm whether the brake has been calibrated and send a screenshot of the SIMSONN Manager interface so I can help identify the issue. You can upload the video to Google Drive and share the link with viewing access enabled.

Good evening I made a video and took a screenshot of simsonn manager but I
didn't order a handbrake I purchased the hs pro h/sequential  shifter I
would like to return my order

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 5:34 AM service@simsonn.com

This is the video and picture for the HD pro

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026, 1:48 PM david manning <r3ac1nt0th3star@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Good evening I made a video and took a screenshot of simsonn manager but I
> didn't order a handbrake I purchased the hs pro h/sequential  shifter I
> would like to return my order
>
> On Wed, Jan 7, 2026, 5:34 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi david manning,  The photos you provided show that you purchased the HB Pro. Could you please confirm whether the issue is that the HS Pro cannot connect? Also, could you provide a video showing the product powered on, so we can check whether the indicator lights turn on?

Ok thank you i would like to return my purchase thank you very much i need
a shipping label thank you in advance

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026, 9:39 PM service@simsonn.com

On Tue, Jan 13, 2026, 11:36 AM david manning <r3ac1nt0th3star@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Ok thank you i would like to return my purchase thank you very much i need
> a shipping label thank you in advance
>
> On Fri, Jan 9, 2026, 9:39 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi david manning,       The video upload appears to be incomplete, so I’m unable to open it. Please resend it via Google Drive and set the access permission to Anyone with the link can view.

I will resend it.


On Wed, Jan 14, 2026, 6:16 AM service@simsonn.com

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026, 1:53 PM david manning <r3ac1nt0th3star@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Did you receive the video
>
>
> On Wed, Jan 14, 2026, 6:16 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi david manning,  I haven’t received the video link from Google Drive yet. It might not have been sent successfully, or the sharing permission may not be enabled. Could you please send it again and set the permission to “Anyone with the link can view”? Also, please paste the link directly in your reply, and I’ll check it right away.

Is there a specwfic email i can link it too

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 9:15 PM david manning <r3ac1nt0th3star@gmail.com>
wrote:

>
> On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 9:06 PM service@simsonn.com
On Thu, Jan 15, 2026, 9:06 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi david manning,     I can’t open the video on my side right now. Please upload it to Google Drive again and set the permission to “Anyone with the link can view.” Once done, please send me the share link, and I’ll be able to watch it and confirm the issue. Thank you!

I just  sent another link from George manning
